scoreboard_show_kit_maps.name: Show kit & map on scoreboard
scoreboard_show_kit_maps.description: Select if you'd like to show or hide the map and kit on the scoreboard

premium.description: §7Premium is a one-time purchased rank that enhances users' experiences and gives them exclusive features and benefits on Plexverse. It can be purchased from our Lobby.

premium_plus.description: §7Premium+ is an enhanced membership tier that offers additional benefits for Premium users. It can be purchased from our Lobby.

creator.description: §7Creator is a rank designated for community members who actively contribute content to our platform. To apply, visit our website.

builder.description: §7Builders are responsible for designing maps for Plexverse. They possess expertise in level design, architecture, and excel in creativity. To apply, visit our forums.

trial_moderator.description: §7Trial Moderators assist the community while learning the ropes and duties of a Moderator. Use §e/msg§7 to ask them a question.

moderator.description: §7Moderators serve as a bridge between the community and the server's administration while ensuring a smooth and safe operation for all.

admin.description: §7Admins oversee Plexverse's technical aspects and manage teams to ensure proper server operation.
